author: Диня, Макс & Илья
name: Dead and Happy
bootlegger: Dead players (not Demons) keep their abilities. Each Townsfolk loses their ability at the start of night 1, then regains it on death.

name: Phantom Detectives
ability: Dead players (not Demons) keep their abilities. Each Townsfolk loses their ability at the start of night 1, then regains it on death.
